metadata.title: Create And Update ServiceNow Record
metadata.description: This playbook will create or update incident in SNOW. When incident is created, playbook will run and create incident in SNOW. When incident is updated, playbook will run and add update to comment section. When incident is closed, playbook will run and close incident in SNOW.
postDeployment: 1. Add Microsoft Sentinel Responder role to the playbook's managed identity.
3. Create an automation rules for when incident is created or updated and add this playbook as an action.
metadata.prerequisites:
We will need following data to make Jira connector:

1. SNOW instance (ex. xyz.service-now.com)

2. Username

3. Password

releaseNotes.title: Create And Update ServiceNow Record
notes: Bugfix to handle html tags in comment
